General.Name: Oylum Sinai Yatirimlar AS
General.Description: Oylum Sinai Yatirimlar Anonim Sirketi provides biscuits, wafers, sandwich biscuits, coated wafers, and marshmallows. The company was founded in 1969 and is based in Kayseri, Turkey.
